text: The 1968 Bexley Council election took place on 9 May 1968 to elect members of Bexley London Borough Council in London, England. The whole council was up for election and the Conservative party gained overall control of the council. ==Background== ==Election result== ==Ward results== ==References== 1968 Category:1968 London Borough council elections
title: 1968 Bexley London Borough Council election
